body: {"user_partner_profile": "I'm a 28-year-old software engineer living in San Francisco. I love hiking, indie music, and spending weekends exploring coffee shops. I value honesty, good communication, and someone who can make me laugh. I'm looking for a long-term relationship with someone who shares my love for the outdoors and appreciates dry humor. I work as a Software Engineer at Tech Corp and have a Bachelor's degree. I'm a non-smoker, drink socially, and am politically moderate. I want children in the future and am somewhat religious (Christian)."}
